name: third-natures
description: so to get the entire structure to work on AWS, create zip internally and then run 'zip -d Archive.zip __MACOSX/\*' from CLI. or else weird things happen from the .ebextensions files. Also switch out the node npm start. - 'node app.js' as opposed to the webpack: 'webpack -w & nodemon --watch server -e js,html app.js'
